title: 127: 5 Brain Damaging Foods You Need to Avoid
description:
What are the foods you must avoid to have a healthy brain?

What you eat matters to your gray matter. We’re back in the Kwik Brain kitchen today with Liana Werner-Gray, the author of Cancer Free with Food, 10 Minute Recipes, and Earth Diet.

In this episode, Liana shares the top 5 foods you should avoid to protect your brain & body, and alternative foods you can add instead.

** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. **
